H0.text: Less waste is one problem when robots are used to help manufacture cars.

H1.text: Lower cost is one problem with using robots to help manufacture cars.

H2.text: Fewer jobs are the problem that arises when robots are used to help manufacture cars.

H3.text: More mistakes are a problem when robots are used to help manufacture cars.

A4.text: The benefits of automation includes labor savings, reducing waste...

A5.text: some studies seem to indicate that industrial automation could impose ill effects beyond operational concerns, including worker displacement due to systemic loss of employment...
